snippet: “Our aircraft on patrol mission on the border fired and shot down the vehicle within the rules of engagement,” Turkey’s military said.

byline.contributor: Neil MacFarquhar contributed reporting from Moscow.

abstract: Turkish military reports shooting down unmanned aircraft violating its airspace near Syrian border; suspects it was Russian drone based on latest discoveries of Russian aircraft infringing on its territory since Moscow began military campaign in Syria.
lead_paragraph: “Our aircraft on patrol mission on the border fired and shot down the vehicle within the rules of engagement,” Turkey’s military said.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Turkey: Jets Shoot Down a Drone
headline.main: Turkish Jets Shoot Down Drone Near Syria
